description: in a circular frame, portrait of a man facing left, looking out; wearing soft hat, white neck cloth; around circle name and dates of subject; behind circle a rectangular frame with 2 heads and a reclining figure on left and artist's palette with brushes; all enclosed in a larger rectangular frame with fans at corners
marks:
Title,  

in plate in black: CXVII/ NICOLO LAPI
title: Portrait of Niccolo Lapi
